commands.title: Web Technology: An Overview
commands.subtitle: Exploring the Landscape of Modern Web Development

slides.title: Introduction to Web Technology
slides.content: Web technology encompasses the tools and techniques used to create and interact with web content. It's a constantly evolving field, driving innovation across various industries.
slides.notes: Welcome the audience and provide a brief overview of the presentation. Highlight the importance of web technology in today's world.

elements.description: Rectangle shape with subtle gradient as a background element

slides.title: Client-Side Technologies
slides.content:
Focuses on what the user sees and interacts with directly:

*   **HTML:** Structure of the web page
*   **CSS:** Styling and presentation
*   **JavaScript:** Interactivity and dynamic content
slides.notes: Explain the role of each client-side technology. Emphasize the importance of a good user experience.

elements.description: Callout shape pointing to each technology

slides.title: Server-Side Technologies
slides.content:
Handles the logic and data processing behind the scenes:

*   **Languages:** Python, Java, PHP, Node.js
*   **Databases:** MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
*   **Frameworks:** Django, Spring, Laravel
slides.notes: Discuss the various server-side technologies and their respective advantages. Mention the role of databases in storing and managing data.

elements.description: Rounded rectangle shapes for each technology group

slides.title: Web Development Frameworks
slides.content:
Frameworks provide a structure for building web applications efficiently. Examples:

*   **Frontend:** React, Angular, Vue.js
*   **Backend:** Express.js, Django, Ruby on Rails
slides.notes: Explain what frameworks are and why they are important for efficient development. Briefly describe some popular frontend and backend frameworks.

elements.description: Arrow shapes connecting frontend and backend frameworks

slides.title: API (Application Programming Interface)
slides.content: APIs allow different applications to communicate with each other. Crucial for modern web services and integrations.
slides.notes: Explain the concept of APIs and their importance in connecting different systems. Use a simple analogy to illustrate the concept.

elements.description: Diagram illustrating how APIs connect different applications

slides.title: Web Security
slides.content:
Protecting web applications from threats:

*   **Authentication:** Verifying user identity
*   **Authorization:** Controlling access to resources
*   **Encryption:** Protecting sensitive data
slides.notes: Highlight the importance of web security and the different measures that can be taken to protect web applications from attacks. Discuss common vulnerabilities like SQL injection and cross-site scripting.

slides.title: Responsive Web Design
slides.content: Ensuring websites adapt to different screen sizes and devices. Essential for a good user experience on all platforms.
slides.notes: Explain the concept of responsive web design and its importance in providing a consistent user experience across different devices. Mention techniques like media queries and flexible layouts.

elements.description: Mockups of a website displayed on different devices (desktop, tablet, mobile)

slides.title: The Future of Web Technology
slides.content:
Emerging trends shaping the web:

*   **AI and Machine Learning:** Personalized experiences
*   **Web3 and Blockchain:** Decentralized applications
*   **Progressive Web Apps (PWAs):** App-like experiences in the browser
slides.notes: Discuss the future trends in web technology and their potential impact. Mention technologies like AI, Web3, and PWAs.

elements.description: Circle shapes representing each trend, connected by lines

slides.title: Conclusion & Q&A
slides.content: Web technology is a dynamic and ever-evolving field. Continuous learning and adaptation are crucial for success.
slides.notes: Summarize the key takeaways from the presentation and open the floor for questions.
